user.title: Set up EcoFlow PowerOcean Plus
user.description:
Enter your EcoFlow account credentials. These are used exclusively to connect to the EcoFlow Cloud API.

**Note:** Use your EcoFlow App login credentials — not the Developer API Keys.

data_description.email: Email address of your EcoFlow user account
data_description.password: Password of your EcoFlow user account (stored encrypted)
data_description.serial_number: Device serial number (e.g. R371ZD1AZH4U0484) — found on the device label or in the EcoFlow App under device details.
data_description.num_battery_packs: Number of physically installed battery packs (1–9). Default for a 10 kWh system with two 5 kWh packs: 2.

error.invalid_auth: Incorrect email or password. Please use your EcoFlow App login credentials.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the EcoFlow API. Please check your internet connection.
error.invalid_serial: Invalid serial number. Please check the device label or the EcoFlow App.
error.unknown: Unexpected error. Please check the Home Assistant logs.

abort.already_configured: A device with this serial number is already configured.
